resources.string: Please enter a valid number of messages
SMS permission is required to send messages

⚠️ IMPORTANT: For Android 15+ users

If you see "App was denied access to SMS", follow these steps:
1. Long press the app icon
2. Tap "App info"
3. Tap the 3 dots (⋮) in the top right
4. Select "Allow restricted settings"
5. Go to Permissions
6. Enable SMS permission

This is required because Android 15 and newer versions have stricter security rules for SMS access.

⚠️ SMS Rate Limit Warning

Android limits the number of SMS messages that can be sent in a time period. To avoid hitting this limit, run this command in ADB:

settings put global sms_outgoing_check_max_count 99999

This will increase the limit to 99999 messages.
